title: Transforming McLovin's Gaming PC at Micro Center!
description: SPONSORS: Shop VIP-SCDKey OEM Windows 10 Pro keys for $16 and use code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:   We made a trip out to the Duluth, GA Micro Center to clean and upgrade McLovin's gaming PC! If you haven't met McLovin, he's a channel native, making many appearances in earlier videos. Unfortunately, his PC has become super gross over the last 4 years! Thankfully, Micro Center has us covered! We've around $400 for a shopping spree! What will he choose to upgrade?   Consider supporting us on Patreon!   More Micro Center goodies: New Customer Exclusive - $25 Off ALL Processors:  Check out Micro Centers Custom PC Builder:  Submit your build to Micro Centers Build Showcase:  Stay Updated on Everything Tech on the Micro Center Community:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony A7C (Primary):  Sony a6600 (Secondary):  Sony a6400 (Webcam):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.  #MicroCenter #GamingPC
